verses.text:
Con-sid-er the lil-ies of the field, how they grow! "Not Sol-o-mon in all
Val-ley lil-ies, gold-en heart-ed, Love's sweet mes-sage you un-furl, For you tell us
Val-ley lil-ies, in the eve-ning your per-fume is sent a-broad, Ever point-ing

Pure and lil-y-white, bend-ing low in prayer, For you teach us to be meek,
Perfumed prayers for the night-time, If we sought His Fa-ther's care, Snow-y lil-ies of the val-ley,
Then we would be like the lil-ies, That we care, The world may come.
Speak a-gain your mes-sage sweet, Tell us how to live for Je-sus, Heav-en's Lil-y, somewhat fair!

chorus.text:
Snow-y lil-ies of the val-ley, Snow-y lil-ies of the val-ley,
Snow-y lil-ies of the val-ley, Speak a-gain your mes-sage sweet!
